    Graphing utility for TESTAR' tests.

    Urko Rueda Molina (alias: urueda)

      • grapher

        public static void grapher(java.lang.String testSequencePath,
                           java.lang.String testGenerator,
                           java.lang.String maxReward,
                           java.lang.String discount)
        Run a new TESTAR grapher.
        Parameters:
        testGenerator - A valid generator is expected.

      • notify

        public static void notify(org.fruit.alayer.State state,
                          java.lang.String stateshotPath,
                          org.fruit.alayer.Action action,
                          java.lang.String actionshotPath,
                          java.lang.String actionRepresentation)
        Notification about an executed action from a SUT state, which is considered a Movement. This movement is added to a FIFO queue, which can be consumed synchronously.
        Parameters:
        state - SUT state before action execution.
        stateshotPath - SUT state screenshot before action execution.
        action - Executed action.
        actionshotPath - SUT state screenshot after action execution.
        actionRepresentation - A text representation for the action.

      • walkFinished

        public static void walkFinished(boolean status,
                                org.fruit.alayer.State endState,
                                java.lang.String scrshotPath)
        Get notification about the end of a test sequence.
        Parameters:
        status - 'true' walk finished OK, 'false' walk suddenly STOPPED.
        endState - Ending SUT state.
        scrshotPath - The state screenshot.
